item.title: Hello World
item.description: Welcome to my blog First off, I am human who occasionally wonders if our world might be more akin to a computer program than we realize. Don’t be alarmed, it’s merely a philosophical pondering, not a declaration of eccentricity. I can imagine a day when AI might start write its own blog. Yet, let’s not stray too far into the AI. The matter at hand is my own foray into blogging, inspired by Lilian Wengâ€™s blog.
